revision.text:
== Details == ===Description=== A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground. ===Acquisition=== Purchased from Cinnabar Island for 5,000 Quest tokens ===Effects=== You can mine in the Underground {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
